title: Twig
desc: The templating engine that makes a lot of Fourstatics features possible.

title: JSON
desc: A great way to store data, with small filesizes and universally usable.

title: YAML
desc: Makes even smaller files possible than JSON, but isn't quite as universally usable.

title: SASS
desc: Makes CSS so much more enjoyable, with things like variables and mixins.

title: LESS
desc: An alternative to SASS that has a similar popularity and set of features.

title: Markdown
desc: Very easy markup language that is converted to HTML.

title: jKit
desc: A very easy to use and feature rich frontend toolkit, based on jQuery.
